about_the_game:
Embark on a culinary adventure like never before with Forg Feast Frenzy, a unique and engaging singleplayer cooking game made with streamers in mind seeking to forge connections with their audience while having an absolute blast, all packaged together in a folk-y Baltic aesthetic. This game transcends traditional gaming experiences by blending elements of creativity, humor, and downright weirdness, providing players with an opportunity to immerse themselves in the delightful chaos of culinary experimentation.

In the fantastical realm of Forg Feast Frenzy, players are not just cooks; they are the ultimate froggy chef. The objective is simple yet exhilarating: cook up a storm for your fluffy and slimy costumers using a medley of bizarre and fascinating ingredients to create dishes that are as entertaining as they are delicious.

You can...

  • Use 4 different cooking appliances to make delicious and funky meals, like frying some crispy French Flies or spin tasty Cotton Webs
  • Throw on a variety of toppings and condiments to satisfy your customers' needs
  • Challenge yourself to Time Trial challenges...
  • ...or go into Relax Mode and just have a chill time
  • Activate the Streamer features to stream your gameplay on Twitch, and take orders directly from your audience!
  • Use your hard earned money to customize your food cart with wonderful ethnic Estonian, Finno-Ugric, and Slavic designs ^_^
  • Meet over a dozen swampy denizens and lure them to your cart with your weird culinary creations

Forg Feast Frenzy is a game designed for streamers to interact with their viewers and just have a good time.

In Forg Feast Frenzy you can become your dream forg chef to cook weird and interesting (and tasty) meals for your swampy friends. Fry some French flies, make cotton webs, and earn some cool coin while doing so!

Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or equivalent
  • Processor: i3 or higher or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
